welcome.title: Welcome to J2ME Launcher
welcome.subtitle: A modern J2ME front-end
welcome.description: To get started quickly, spend a few minutes on basic setup

emulator.title: Emulator Configuration
emulator.subtitle: Emulator Configuration
emulator.notice: Due to license incompatibility, this app does not bundle emulators. Please download them yourself:

freej2me.name: FreeJ2ME-Plus
freej2me.description: A rising star in J2ME emulation. Compatible with multiple J2ME specs and provides both an AWT frontend and a Libretro core.

kemulator.name: KEmulator nnmod
kemulator.description: Reverse-engineered from the classic KEmulator, with many optimizations and support for multiple desktop platforms.

roms.title: ROM Path
roms.description: Choose where game files are stored
roms.subtitle: Configure ROM Folder

midp.name: J2ME-MIDP
midp.description: A popular J2ME standard; ROM files use the .jar extension.

cloud.title: Cloud Sync
cloud.description: Protect your app configuration and game saves
cloud.subtitle: Cloud Sync

webdav.name: WebDAV
webdav.description: A universal protocol for data transfer.

s3.name: S3 API
s3.description: S3-compatible services, including AWS S3 and Cloudflare R2.

launch.title: Launch Game
launch.description: Double-click a game card to launch

organize.title: Organize Games
organize.description: Drag games into folders on the left to categorize

search.title: Search Games
search.description: Use the top search bar to find games quickly

settings.title: Game Settings
settings.description: Right-click a game card for per-game settings

complete.title: Explore the world of J2ME
complete.subtitle: Setup Complete
complete.submessage: You can now manage your J2ME collection through this app

folderSelect.title: Select Folder
folderSelect.multi: {{count}} games selected. Choose a folder to add them to:
folderSelect.single: Choose a folder to add "{{name}}" to:

noFolder.title: Add to Folder
noFolder.message: No folders yet. Please create one.

confirmDelete.title: Delete Folder
confirmDelete.message:
Are you sure you want to delete the folder ‘{{name}}’?
After deletion, the games in it will be released to the desktop.

addToFolder.limitExceeded: Folder has reached the game limit ({{limit}} games). Currently has {{currentCount}} games.
addToFolder.batchLimitExceeded: Cannot add {{requestedCount}} games in batch. Folder limit is {{limit}}, currently has {{currentCount}} games, can add at most {{canAdd}} more games.

confirmRemove.title: Remove Folder
confirmRemove.message1: Are you sure you want to remove the following folder?
confirmRemove.message2: This will remove all games under that folder in J2ME Launcher.

emulatorConfig.title: Emulator Configuration
emulatorConfig.romCacheHint: Recommended to enable in non-UTF-8 systems to avoid games from failing to launch due to encoding issues.
emulatorConfig.name: Game Title
emulatorConfig.saveHint: After saving, this configuration will auto-apply for future game launches.

freej2mePlus.name: FreeJ2ME-Plus (AWT)
freej2mePlus.placeholder: Not configured yet. Please select freej2me.jar
freej2mePlus.hint: Default launch parameters. Each game can override them on first launch (except font and sound)
freej2mePlus.hint2: Sound and font are global parameters. Configure them in ‘Emulator’.
freej2mePlus.compattranstooriginonreset: Translate to origin on graphics reset

kemulator.name: KEmulator nnmod
kemulator.placeholder: Not configured yet. Please select KEmulator.jar
kemulator.hint: Kemnnx currently doesn't support custom launch parameters. Configure them in its GUI.

libretroFJP.name: Libretro (FreeJ2ME-Plus)
libretroFJP.retroarchPlaceholder: Not configured yet. Please select retroarch.exe
libretroFJP.corePlaceholder: Not configured yet. Please select freej2me_libretro.dll
libretroFJP.hint: The Libretro core currently doesn't support custom launch parameters. Configure them in its GUI.

warn.pathChange1: You are modifying the ‘Emulator executable’ path.
warn.pathChange2: Changing the path may cause mismatches in backup and restore paths.
warn.pathChange3: Do you still want to save this change?

sync.title: Cloud Sync
sync.restoreDone: Restore complete. If the database is involved, icons will be rebuilt after scanning.

s3.title: S3 Settings
s3.prefix: Store backups under a specific folder within the bucket, e.g., ‘J2ME/’

dropbox.title: Dropbox Settings
dropbox.prefix: Dropbox automatically creates a ‘J2ME Launcher’ folder, so this can be left blank.

webdav.title: WebDAV Settings
webdav.prefix: Optional. Place under a subfolder of the Base URL, e.g., ‘J2ME/’
webdav.username: Username (optional when using a Bearer Token)
webdav.password: Password (optional when using a Bearer Token)
webdav.bearerToken: Optional. For token authentication used by some servers
webdav.note: If Username/Password and Bearer Token are both provided, Bearer Token takes precedence.

about.notice:
Without an emulator, J2ME Launcher would be an empty shell.
This software is MIT-licensed, so it does not include emulators that may have incompatible licenses. Please download them yourself.
about.freej2mePlusDescription: A rising star from J2ME EMU. Compatible with various J2ME specifications and offers both an AWT frontend and a Libretro core.
about.kemulatorDescription: Reverse engineering of the classic KEmulator, offering many optimizations and support for multiple desktop platforms.

notification.partialFailure: Some shortcuts could not be created
